verses.verse: <S%H5375>Moreover,<s%> take up a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> for the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

and <S%H559>say,<s%> What was your <S%H517>mother?<s%> A <S%H3833>lioness:<s%> she <S%H7257>couched<s%> among <S%H738>lions,<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the young <S%H3715>lions<s%> she <S%H7235>nourished<s%> her <S%H1482>cubs.<s%>

She brought <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of her <S%H1482>cubs:<s%> he became a young <S%H3715>lion,<s%> and he <S%H3925>learned<s%> to <S%H2963>catch<s%> the <S%H2964>prey;<s%> he <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H120>men.<s%>

The <S%H1471>nations<s%> also <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H8610>him;<s%> he was taken in their <S%H7845>pit;<s%> and they <S%H935>brought<s%> him with <S%H2397>hooks<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Now when she <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she had <S%H3176>waited,<s%> and her <S%H8615>hope<s%> was <S%H6>lost,<s%> then she <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> of her <S%H1482>cubs,<s%> and <S%H7760>made<s%> him a young <S%H3715>lion.<s%>

He went up and <S%H1980>down<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H738>lions;<s%> he became a young <S%H3715>lion,<s%> and he <S%H3925>learned<s%> to <S%H2963>catch<s%> the <S%H2964>prey;<s%> he <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H120>men.<s%>

He <S%H3045>knew<s%> their <S%H490>palaces,<s%> and laid <S%H2717>waste<s%> their <S%H5892>cities;<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H3456>desolate,<s%> and its <S%H4393>fullness,<s%> because of the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of his <S%H7581>roaring.<s%>

Then the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5414>set<s%> against him on every <S%H5439>side<s%> from the <S%H4082>provinces;<s%> and they <S%H6566>spread<s%> their <S%H7568>net<s%> over <S%H8610>him;<s%> he was taken in their <S%H7845>pit.<s%>

They <S%H5414>put<s%> him in a <S%H5474>cage<s%> with <S%H2397>hooks,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> him to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon;<s%> they <S%H935>brought<s%> him into <S%H4685>strongholds,<s%> that his <S%H6963>voice<s%> should no more be <S%H8085>heard<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Your <S%H517>mother<s%> was like a <S%H1612>vine,<s%> in your <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H8362>planted<s%> by the <S%H4325>waters:<s%> it was <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> and full of <S%H6058>branches<s%> by reason of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

It had <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4294>rods<s%> for the <S%H7626>scepters<s%> of those who bore <S%H4910>rule,<s%> and their <S%H6967>stature<s%> was <S%H1361>exalted<s%> among the thick <S%H5688>boughs,<s%> and they were <S%H7200>seen<s%> in their <S%H1363>height<s%> with the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of their <S%H1808>branches.<s%>

But it was plucked <S%H5428>up<s%> in <S%H2534>fury,<s%> it was cast <S%H7993>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> dried <S%H3001>up<s%> its <S%H6529>fruit:<s%> its <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4294>rods<s%> were <S%H6561>broken<s%> off and <S%H3001>withered;<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> consumed <S%H398>them.<s%>
Now it is <S%H8362>planted<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> in a <S%H6723>dry<s%> and <S%H6772>thirsty<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H784>Fire<s%> is gone <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4294>rods<s%> of its <S%H905>branches,<s%> it has <S%H398>devoured<s%> its <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> so that there is in it no <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4294>rod<s%> to be a <S%H7626>scepter<s%> to <S%H4910>rule.<s%> This is a <S%H7015>lamentation,<s%> and shall be for a <S%H7015>lamentation.<s%>
